title: Phishing Scam
description: Scammers send fake emails or SMS pretending to be banks, government agencies, or companies to steal personal information.
warning_signs: Urgent message: 'Your account will be blocked'
Fake link disguised as official website
Requests for OTP, password, PAN or Aadhaar
protection_tips: Manually open websites instead of using message links
examples: Email: 'Your SBI account will be suspended. Verify now: sb1-ver1fy.com'
SMS: 'Update KYC or your UPI will be blocked'

title: UPI Payment Fraud
description: Scammers trick users into approving pull-payment requests or sharing OTP to steal money via UPI.
warning_signs: Caller pretending to be from bank asking for OTP
Asking for remote access apps like AnyDesk/TeamViewer
protection_tips: Never share OTP or PIN with anyone
if_scammed: Raise complaint through bank customer care
Contact your UPI app support immediately
examples: UPI payment request for ‚Çπ1 claiming 'verification fees'
Fake customer care asking to 'reverse payment' using OTP

title: Fake Job Offer Scam
description: Fraudsters offer unrealistic job opportunities requiring upfront payment for registration or training.
warning_signs: Asking money for training or joining
protection_tips: Verify job postings on official websites
Never pay for job interviews or joining
examples: 'Pay ‚Çπ999 registration fee to get offer letter'

title: Lottery & Prize Scam
description: Scammers claim you won a prize or lottery but ask for a fee to release the amount.
warning_signs: You never participated in a contest
protection_tips: Never pay to receive a prize

title: KYC Update Scam
description: Fraudsters impersonate banks and ask users to update KYC or risk account closure.
protection_tips: Only update KYC on official websites
Call bank official numbers from website
examples: SMS: 'KYC expired, update now or account will be blocked!'

title: Investment Fraud
description: Scammers lure users into fake investment plans with guaranteed high returns.

title: Fake Government Official Scam
description: Scammers impersonate government officials to extract money or personal details.
protection_tips: Government officials never ask for money

title: Loan App Scam
description: Illegal mobile apps offer instant loans and then blackmail users using their contacts/photos.
warning_signs: Access asked to contacts and gallery

title: Online Shopping Fraud
description: Fake shopping websites or sellers take payments but never deliver items.
warning_signs: Prices too low to be real
protection_tips: Avoid buying from unknown Instagram sellers

title: Dating & Romance Scam
description: Scammers build emotional trust online and later request money or personal info.
protection_tips: Never send money to online strangers
examples: 'I love you, please send ‚Çπ5,000 ‚Äî my mother is in hospital'
